title: FS: 1912 T202 McBride-Milan-Shoeless Joe Jackson PSA 7 (MC) SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 T202 McBride-Milan-Shoeless Joe Jackson PSA 7 (MC) SOLD
posts.post_content:
Simply put, a great card!!! And I've seen a lot worse cards that didn't get a miscut designation. And if the graders would finally put Shoeless Joe on the flip, this card would sell for a ton. The price is SOLD delivered PP/FF please. Thank you for looking.

Joe K

Are you sure that's Jackson in the center panel?
Yes according to the research done. The Shoeless Joe Jackson museum has confirmed this as well.

Last bump and great low price! Thanks for reaching out. :)
